welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hattersheim, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city, known for its quaint streets and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Hattersheim has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving Lufthansa and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Under construction and expected to open in 2023, this terminal will primarily serve low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but limited to 30 minutes per device per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
